name: Puzzle World: Cute Monsters
description:
Welcome to the game "Puzzle world - cute monsters". Here you will find exciting conundrums in the form of puzzles. You have to combine many different fragments together, while creating a whole picture. Dive into the fascinating world of cute monsters! Don't stop at one - collect them all! The game is perfect for all ages.
A lot of exciting pictures are waiting for you. Good luck!
